body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is George Garcia and the customer's name is Sharon Jenkins.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is George Garcia, and I’m here with Gem State Pawn Shop. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi George, I have some questions about your services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, I'd be happy to help with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon! Now, to assist you better, could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was born on June fifth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could you also provide me with your zip code for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one zero two zero five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Sharon. We take privacy very seriously at Gem State Pawn Shop, and your details will be kept confidential.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That’s good to hear. I appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sharon! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
